Composite Form Pattern Learn More

Configuration Options

  1. Default Composite Form Example View Example
  2. Composite Form With No Summary Area View Example

API Details

Settings

  • settings
  • breakpoint String  -  Defines the breakpoint at which the composite form will change into its responsive mode
  • trigger String  -  Expandable area trigger selector. Passed to expandable area.
  • expandedText String  -  Text to use for the expand button (Default localized)
  • collapsedText String  -  Text to use for the collapse button (Default localized)

Functions

build

Adds markup to the control and stores references to some sub-elements

Returns this

Events

Sets up event handlers for this control and its sub-elements

Parameters

  • expanderText string the text content

Returns undefined

checkResponsive

Checks if we've passed the breakpoint for switching into Responsive mode.

Returns undefined

setExpanderText

Sets the text content of the Composite Form's Expandable Area Expander.

Parameters

  • expanderText string the text content

Returns undefined

updated

Re-invokes the Composite Form

Returns this

teardown

Simple Teardown - remove events & rebuildable markup.

Returns this

destroy

Destroys the component instance by removing it from its associated element.

Returns this
